data.text: @cpat3188 Only since the 1920’s and its just gotten worse. Plus, they likely have staff of their own also getting paid fairly well. Then they run speeches by focus groups…more $$ to tweak it… we are paying for theater and to be manipulated. We should change that.
@JesseASweeney Oh my that's egregious and salary equivalent of an Executive appointment.
@JesseASweeney I agree, but I suppose it's part of the president's staff
@JesseASweeney Guess you missed the Biden interview from the other day where he said everything was great, we're all just too dumb to see it.
@cpat3188 I don’t think tax payers should have to pay for WH speech writers honestly.
@cpat3188 He gets $155,000 of taxpayer money to bullshit to tax payers. Most of his admin is making over $100k of our money just to lie to us.
